Internal connection attempts to newly re.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log to identify outbound connections to domains registered within the last 30-90 days. Prioritize domains with privacy-protected WHOIS or other suspicious registration details (requires correlating Zeek data with external WHOIS data). Use statistical analysis (e.g., frequency) to identify unusual connection patterns to these new domains.

Network traffic patterns originating fro.Action: Correlate source IP addresses in Zeek conn.log connecting to organization assets with threat intelligence feeds containing known scanning or adversary infrastructure IPs. Identify connection patterns (e.g., entropy of destination ports/services accessed from a single source IP) indicative of reconnaissance or initial probing from acquired infrastructure.
